pkgmetadata.longdescription: Blind Source Separation Methods for Tensor-Valued Observations // Contains several utility functions for manipulating tensor- valued data (centering, multiplication from a single mode etc.) and the implementations of the following blind source separation methods for tensor-valued data: 'tPCA', 'tFOBI', 'tJADE', k-tJADE', 'tgFOBI', 'tgJADE', 'tSOBI', 'tNSS.SD', 'tNSS.JD', 'tNSS.TD.JD' and 'tPP'.
